sentence.Network_en: The mayor is condemned for the monstrous malfeasance of his administration.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于其政府的荒谬违法行为,市长被宣告有罪.

sentence.Network_en: For me they are only entities , emblems of social malfeasance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对我来说只不过是几个客观存在的人, 社会上渎职行为的代表而已.

sentence.Network_en: The mayor was accused of malfeasance after the audit was completed and irregularities were discovered.
sentence.Network_cn: 审计结束后,发现了不规范操作,市长因渎职受到控告.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... malevolent 恶毒,恶意的 malfeasance 渎职,恶行 malform 使畸形.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... malevolent 有恶意的 malfeasance 不正当 malfeasant 不正的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... feasible a 可行的；可能的 malfeasance n 不法行为 defeat v 打败，摧毁.
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... making arrest 拘捕,逮捕 malfeasance 恶行,劣迹 malice 恶意.

list.abs: Beijing fears official malfeasance and graft is undermining its authority and sparking protests by disgruntled workers and farmers .中国政府担忧，官员渎职及贪污正在削弱政府权威，并引发工人和农民抗议。
The mayor is condemned for the monstrous malfeasance of his administration ., 由于其政府的荒谬违法行为 , 市长被宣告有罪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Anglo-Norman French malfaisance, from mal- 'evil' + Old French faisance 'activity'. Compare with misfeasance

means.word_mean: 1. wrongful conduct by a public official

auth_sentence.content: Even when Mr. Gore describes government malfeasance, he misses the point.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even when Mr. Gore describes government malfeasance, he misses the point.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even when Mr. Gore describes government malfeasance, he misses the point.

auth_sentence.content: One of the tasks of a free press is to uncover public malfeasance.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the tasks of a free press is to uncover public malfeasance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the tasks of a free press is to uncover public malfeasance.

auth_sentence.content: This failure to act in the way that we entrust you to do, or nonfeasance, is now borderline malfeasance, or actual misconduct.
